alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:53PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Ouray and northeastern Montrose Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 453 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Montrose, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. Brief moderate to heavy rain also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Montrose around 505 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 115 and 130. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 89 and 112. Colorado 90 between mile markers 82 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley
